projectName: Autodash: Turn Data Visualization Into Art

scenes.title: Hero Opening
scenes.visualDescription: Full-screen hero banner image fade-in showing the Autodash interface with colorful data visualizations and charts

scenes.title: The Problem & Vision
scenes.narration: After testing Autodash, our AI Data Apps product, we discovered something fascinating. Users don't just want standard dashboards. They want to personalize the experience deeply, treating data visualization as a form of art. So we listened, and added features designed to help them become true data artists, turning insights into visually stunning, highly customized creations.
scenes.visualDescription: Split-screen comparison: Left side shows 'Standard Dashboard' with basic, uniform charts. Right side shows 'Data Artist's Creation' with colorful, customized visualizations. Animated transition between them with sparkle effects. Text overlay: 'From Analytics Tool → To Creative Canvas'

scenes.title: Feature 1: Direct Color Control
scenes.narration: The first major feature: Now users can change trace, line, bar, and component colors directly, instead of asking AI to regenerate the chart with a different color. The system auto-detects components generated in the visualization, giving you instant control over every visual element.
scenes.visualDescription: Animated demonstration: Show a line chart with a color picker UI appearing. User clicks on a green line, color picker opens, selects a new shade with lower opacity. Line smoothly transitions to new color. Text callout: 'No Regeneration Needed • Instant Updates • Full Color Control'. Show multiple chart elements being recolored in sequence.

scenes.title: Feature 2: Background & Opacity Mastery
scenes.narration: Users can now change chart, KPI card, and text backgrounds along with opacity levels, all without regeneration or consuming credits. Switch from white backgrounds to black, invert text colors, adjust transparency. This same functionality applies seamlessly to KPI cards, giving you complete thematic control.
scenes.visualDescription: Before/After animation sequence: Show chart transitioning from white background to black background. Text changes from black to white simultaneously. Then show KPI card doing the same transformation. Include opacity slider animating from 100% to 60% showing transparency effect. Text overlay: 'Backgrounds • Opacity • Text Colors → All Editable'

scenes.title: Feature 3: Dashboard-Wide Styling
scenes.narration: Take it even further: Select a color for the entire dashboard, adjust opacity, and apply beautiful two-color gradients across your whole workspace. Transform your entire analytics environment with a single creative decision.
scenes.visualDescription: Full dashboard view animation: Show color edit panel appearing on screen. User selects purple color, entire dashboard background smoothly transitions. Then show gradient application: white-to-gray gradient spreading across dashboard from top to bottom with smooth animation. Show final polished result with all elements harmonized. Text callout: 'Whole Dashboard Control • Solid Colors • Stunning Gradients'

scenes.title: Powered by AI Analytics
scenes.narration: All of this creative control is combined with powerful AI data analytics abilities that help you get answers fast, using Python's data science libraries to find insights. Beauty and brains, working together.
scenes.visualDescription: Show analytics query interface with animated typing of question: 'What are my top revenue drivers?' Then show AI processing with Python code snippets flashing briefly (pandas, matplotlib, numpy). Finally show beautiful, styled chart appearing as the answer. Text overlay: 'AI Analytics + Artistic Control = Perfect Insights'

scenes.title: Coming Soon: Design Features
scenes.narration: We're not stopping here. Coming soon: Preference Memory that learns your color and theme preferences automatically. Professional themes for instant inspiration. And expanded editing capability for fonts, gridlines, and all other visual elements.
scenes.visualDescription: Animated roadmap with three feature cards appearing in sequence: 1) 'Preference Memory' card with brain icon and auto-learning visual, 2) 'Professional Themes' card with gallery of beautiful dashboard previews, 3) 'Full Edit Control' card with font and gridline icons. Each card slides in with a glow effect.

scenes.title: Coming Soon: Analytics Features
scenes.narration: On the analytics side: We're building a dedicated Analytics Mode with a Jupyter notebook-like interface for quick pipeline creation. Plus comprehensive data connectors beyond our current Excel and CSV support, with SQL available on request. Soon, all baseline connectors will be integrated.
scenes.visualDescription: Animated roadmap continuation: Two more feature cards: 1) 'Analytics Mode' showing notebook interface mockup with code cells, 2) 'Universal Connectors' showing icons for SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, APIs flowing into Autodash logo. Text overlay: 'Build Faster • Connect Everything'

scenes.title: Try Autodash Today
scenes.narration: Autodash is the perfect tool for analytics done beautifully. Transform raw data into stunning, interactive visualizations. No code. No complexity. Just pure creative data storytelling. Visit autodash dot art to become a data artist today.
scenes.visualDescription: Closing sequence: Show multiple beautiful dashboard examples in a montage, each with different color schemes and styles, rapidly transitioning. End with Autodash logo and URL 'autodash.art' prominently displayed. Text overlay: 'Your AI Data Artist • Start Creating Today'
